note: Owner/operator of Tech Arcana blog, and (very) part time coder. Currently self-studying guitar, and website design/implementation. I'm also very much into science and technology, especially things like AI, computer science, computer/information security, biotechnology, transhumanism, and probably more than I can remember to put here. Essentially I'll geek out on anything fitting somewhere in the science/technology/computer realms. Curious? Ask. :)
